title: blitz and yi afk and feeders
body: my next match was blitz afk at thestart causing trist to feed and subsequent yi afk for 10 minutes i still managed to do ok considering im getting ranked based on afkers im fuking pissed about being called bronze

replies.body: No one cares, you clearly flame people so until you learn to not be toxic and admit that you are bronze and you deserve bronze you will never be able to climb
